doc.title: Veracity
doc.plot: After proposing to his girl friend at their anniversary dinner, John walks to his car to find that all of his tires have been slashed. He romantically decides to walk her home, yet they never reach their destination. A gang sitting by the sidewalk approaches them to start trouble. John is brutally beaten and forced to watch while his fianc√©e is raped. After passing out from being stabbed, John wakes up to find Sarah's mangled body on him. John falls into a deep depression and begins to drink heavily. He has lost everything and desperately tries to find answers to why all this had happened to him. On his quest for revenge, he slowly realizes that he was indirectly responsible for his girlfriend's death...
